effect.diamond_pearl: Inflicts typeless damage equal to half the target’s remaining HP.
effect.platinum: Inflicts typeless damage equal to half the target’s remaining HP.
effect.heartgold_soulsilver: Inflicts typeless damage equal to half the target’s remaining HP.

short_effect.diamond_pearl: Inflicts damage equal to half the target’s HP.
short_effect.platinum: Inflicts damage equal to half the target’s HP.
short_effect.heartgold_soulsilver: Inflicts damage equal to half the target’s HP.

flavor_text.diamond_pearl: The user chomps hard on the foe with its sharp front fangs. It cuts the target’s HP to half.
flavor_text.platinum: The user chomps hard on the foe with its sharp front fangs. It cuts the target’s HP to half.
flavor_text.heartgold_soulsilver: The user chomps hard on the foe with its sharp front fangs. It cuts the target’s HP to half.
